column1: #text=I love to make cheesecake for my family .
#text=We have a family recipe that I follow when I cook .
#text=First I purchase the ingredients at the store and make certain I have everything I need .
#text=Then I make a crust from scratch in a cake pan , using crumbled cookies , nuts , brown sugar and vanilla flavor .
#text=I turn on the oven to pre-heat , as my oven is very slow to heat up .
#text=I use my electric mixer to whip the pats of cream cheese , making sure they are light and fluffy .
#text=Then I add in eggs , sugar , lemon juice and lemon zest until it is thoroughly combined into a thick liquid .
#text=I pour the mixture into the prepared cake pan and put it into the preheated oven for about 45 minutes .
#text=When the cake is slightly brown on top , I remove it from the oven and place it in the refrigerator to cool .
